full_summary:
================protobuf
Government of Canada - Tender Announcement
=====================================protobuf
### RISO for Fine Evaporated White Salt - Mactaquac Biodiversity Facility

**Call for Standing Offer (Open Bidding)**

The Government of Canada, on behalf of Fisheries and Oceans Canada (DFO), invites contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RISO) for the supply and delivery of fine evaporated white salt to the Mactaquac Biodiversity Facility on an "as and when requested" basis.

### Key Tender Details

| Category | Description |
| --- | --- |
| **Notice Type** | Request for Standing Offer (RISO) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Selection Criteria** | Lowest Price |
| **Laboratory Equipment** | Fall under UNSPSC Code 41100000 |
| **Trade Agreements** | Part of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and other agreements |

### Contract Requirements

* Supply and delivery of fine evaporated white salt to the Mactaquac Biodiversity Facility as and when requested.
* Contract period of one year, with two optional renewals of one year each.

### Contracting Entity

Public Service and Procurement Canada, 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

Lyne Leger2 (SPAC/PSPC) - lyne.leger2@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

### Notice URL

https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17925455?extsite=MTc5MjU0NTVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Tender Closing Date

14:00:00 on 2023-11-24 - **Past Tender Closing Date**

** []**Please note that since the given deadline has expired, you won't be able to respond to this announcement. Also, master this model has restrictions on storing and displaying long strings/text. If you need me to change anything, kindly let me know!**
